reqs:
Pre-reqs: (Open to all students with third-year, or higher, standing in the Faculty of Science.)
Restricted seats are for MAJ ENSC, HON ENSC plus Year 3 or higher for LFS, FRST, and SCIE students.
courseName: Introduction to Research in Environmental Science
description: Environmental research. Students investigate research methodologies and reporting in a range of scientific disciplines and fields.
